timeline.title: Bachelor's Degree in Physics - Benemérita Universidad Autónoma de Puebla
timeline.description: Currently maintaining a 3.7 GPA. Focus on quantum computing, machine learning, and high-energy physics.

timeline.title: Research Assistant - CIIEC, Benemérita Universidad Autónoma de Puebla
timeline.description: Designed and implemented Resistive Plate Chambers (RPCs) simulations using GEANT4. Conducted data analysis with ROOT under Dr. María Isabel Pedraza Morales.

timeline.title: Research Assistant - Benemérita Universidad Autónoma de Puebla
timeline.description: Implementing dense and convolutional neural networks in MATLAB for educational applications and development of optimization algorithms.

timeline.title: Emerging Technologies Program - Mirai Innovation Lab
timeline.description: Developed AI and navigation algorithms for an assistive robotic guide dog designed for visually impaired users in Osaka, Japan.

timeline.title: Google Summer of Code - ML4SCI
timeline.description: Developed quantum generative adversarial networks for Monte Carlo simulations in high-energy physics, focusing on gluon-initiated jet generation using PennyLane and PyTorch.

timeline.title: Quantum Computing Mentorship Program
timeline.description: Evaluated and implemented quantum encodings to optimize circuit performance for executing 9x9 Sudoku on NISQ computers using pytket.

timeline.title: Research Assistant - Medical Physics Laboratory
timeline.description: Characterized scintillating plastics and developed instrumentation for particle detection. Implemented data acquisition systems and analysis pipelines in Python.
